magpie.optimization.algorithms

Class ActiveLearningOptimizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • magpie.optimization.BaseOptimizer
      • magpie.optimization.algorithms.ActiveLearningOptimizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Commandable, Options, Printable

    public class ActiveLearningOptimizer
extends BaseOptimizer
    An active learning scheme that using a machine-learning model to find optimal candidates. Algorithm iteratively builds a model on all evaluated entries and uses it to select which ones evaluate next.

    This implementation uses one uses a CompositeRegression model. The variance between the predictions of the submodels defines the accuracy of the prediction, which can also be used when selecting entries.

    Usage: <Random fraction> <Worst fraction>
    Random fraction: Fraction of entries each generation that will be randomly chosen
    Worst fraction: Fraction of entries to select from the entries with least-reliable predictions

    Implemented Commands:

    set model $<model> - Define group of models to train during optimization
    model: Model to iteratively train and use predictively. Must implement CompositeRegression.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
